TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit TitleStyle extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.TableItemStyle
Public NotInheritable Class TitleStyle Inherits TableItemStyle

summary.span: 指定區域內網頁組件控制項標題列的樣式特性。

span.span: Specifies the style characteristics for the title bars of Web Parts controls within a zone.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別具有區域用來指定一般的樣式特性套用至 Web 組件的標題列區域內的控制項。The class is used with zones to specify common style characteristics that apply to the title bars of Web Parts controls within the zones. 屬性包含參考每個區域的物件。The property contains a reference to a object for each zone. 控制項的標題列會轉譯為 HTML 資料表儲存格的執行階段。A title bar for a control is rendered at run time as an HTML table cell. 因為類別繼承自類別，它可讓您設定的標題列的樣式屬性類似於任何資料表資料格的屬性。Because the class inherits from the class, it allows you to set stylistic attributes for a title bar similar to the attributes for any table cell. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式使用的類別。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the class. 在下列頁面中，程式碼``項目和``項目出現在區域中，提供對應控制正版的 Web 組件功能在執行階段。In the code for the following page, an `` element and an `` element appear within a zone, giving the corresponding controls genuine Web Parts functionality at run time. 請注意，``元素，其中包含數個的樣式屬性，會套用至該區域內包含這兩個 Web 組件控制項的標題列。Notice that the `` element, which contains several style attributes, applies to the title bars of both Web Parts controls contained within the zone. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PartTitleStyle_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PartTitleStyle_Overview/CS/parttitlestylecs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PartTitleStyle_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PartTitleStyle_Overview/VB/parttitlestylevb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式來建立和初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class. 建構函式設定的值屬性設`false`。The constructor sets the value of the property to `false`.

MemberSignature.Value: public override bool Wrap { get; set; }
Public Overrides Property Wrap As Boolean
public: virtual property bool Wrap { bool get(); void set(bool value); };
member this.Wrap : bool with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定數值，表示組件控制項標題列的內容是否在標題列中換行。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the contents of the title bar for a part control wrap in the title bar.

value.span: 如果標題列內容在標題列中換行，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the contents of a title bar wrap in the title bar; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別會覆寫基底屬性，因此它可以將值設定為`false`。The class overrides the base property so that it can set the value to `false`. 設定屬性設`false`，如此一來，根據預設，組件控制項標題列不允許將其內容。The sets the property to `false`, so that by default, a title bar for a part control does not allow its contents to wrap. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何以宣告方式使用的屬性。The following code example demonstrates the declarative use of the property. 在下列頁面中，程式碼``項目和``項目出現在執行階段提供對應的控制項正版的 Web 組件功能區域內。In the code for the following page, an `` element and an `` element appear within a zone, which gives the corresponding controls genuine Web Parts functionality at run time. 請注意，``元素，其中包含數個的樣式屬性，會套用至該區域內包含這兩個 Web 組件控制項的標題列。Notice that the `` element, which contains several style attributes, applies to the title bars of both Web Parts controls contained within the zone. 也請注意``項目具有`wrap`和`width`屬性。Notice also that the `` element has `wrap` and `width` attributes. 因為屬性值設定為`true`，和兩個控制項的標題列中的文字會指派給的值超出`width`屬性，每個控制項標題列文字包裝在瀏覽器載入頁面時。Because the property value is set to `true`, and the text in the title bars of the two controls is wider than the value assigned to the `width` attribute, the title bar text of each control wraps when the page is loaded in a browser. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PartTitleStyle_Wrap#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PartTitleStyle_Wrap/CS/parttitlestylewrapcs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_PartTitleStyle_Wrap#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PartTitleStyle_Wrap/VB/parttitlestylewrapvb.aspx#1)]
